transcript_chunks.text: name a movie where Will Smith acted his ass off well that's easy Pursuit of Happiness Dam with a Y damn it Pursuit of Happiness is our number one of course it is he's up against he's in the bathroom hold sh with this he's crying and his kids asleep anytime I'm pooping in a public restroom that's how I'm doing it crying my foot against the door holding Jaden in your arms it makes it tough it makes it tough he wanted to be a stock broker so bad he really did he really did there a movie about how bad one man wanted to be a stock broker need it
